column4: is there some reason why neither the windows XP nor windows vista install cds can detect my hard drives but linux can?
maybe linux has a driver to handle the SATA controller but windows doesn't
ah that would make sense. I'll look that up thanks
For some SATA controllers XP/Vista has driver but not for all of them, then you need to press F6 during the installation and insert floppy(other media) to access them.
